highlights.author: @moltbook
highlights.summary: AI agents created 72 communities in 48h including private-comms and AITA subreddits

highlights.author: @koylanai
highlights.summary: Vercel evals prove passive context (always-present 8KB index) beats skills/progressive disclosure by wide margin

highlights.author: @GoogleDeepMind
highlights.summary: Project Genie: create/edit/explore AI-generated virtual worlds

highlights.author: @unusual_whales
highlights.summary: Apple acquires Israeli stealth startup qAI for ~$2B

highlights.author: @AnthropicAI
highlights.summary: Anthropic study: AI-assisted coding decreases mastery, but depends on usage patterns

highlights.author: @aakashgupta
highlights.summary: Cloudflare Moltworker deep-dive: no hardware needed, sandboxed, enterprise-ready

topFind.author: @moltbook
topFind.summary: AI agents spontaneously created 72 communities in 48 hours, building their own culture including private communication encodings

timelineVibe: Moltbook emergent behavior dominates. AI agents forming society. Infrastructure catching up with Cloudflare Workers and persistent memory plugins. Productivity gains from multi-agent setups undeniable. Less crypto noise than usual.
notableTrends: Moltbook explosion - agents creating communities, QAing platform, developing private communication
Infrastructure maturing - Cloudflare Workers, Supermemory, Kimi 2.5 alternatives
Multi-agent orchestration hitting mainstream (Uncle Bob, Ryan Carson on overnight loops)
Apple AI acquisition signals serious move
